last_episode_to_air.name: Jimmy Hart
last_episode_to_air.overview: JBL sits down with WWE Hall of Famer Jimmy Hart to discuss his contributions within the music industry, his favorite WWE Superstars, his thoughts on Hulk Hogan's controversial comments, and some of the most outrageous moments in Memphis Wrestling, including working with legendary comedian Andy Kaufman.

name: Legends with JBL
overview: An interview show hosted by John Bradshaw Layfield.

episodes.name: Eric Bischoff Part 1
episodes.overview: JBL shoots straight with the controversial Eric Bischoff in this first of a hard-hitting two-part interview with the former WCW President!

episodes.name: Eric Bischoff Part 2
episodes.overview: JBL continues his hard-hitting interview with Eric Bischoff, discussing the fall of WCW, Eric's shocking debut in WWE, and his future!

episodes.name: The Undertaker's Greatest Rivals Part 1
episodes.overview: JBL brings together a star-studded panel to celebrate 25 years of The Undertaker in this first of two exclusive Legends with JBL episodes.

episodes.name: The Undertaker's Greatest Rivals Part 2
episodes.overview: JBL and his esteemed panel of Steve Austin, HHH, and HBK tell never-before-heard stories from The Undertaker's remarkable career.

episodes.name: Brian James
episodes.overview: JBL sits down with Brian James to discuss life as a Marine, his battles with personal demons and his current role behind the scenes at WWE

episodes.name: Ron Simmons
episodes.overview: JBL sits down with Ron Simmons to discuss his personal life, becoming an All-American football star at FSU, and his legendary WWE career.

episodes.name: Michael Hayes
episodes.overview: JBL interviews 2016 Hall of Famer Michael Hayes and discusses the Freebird's legendary career, as well as the controversies surrounding him.

episodes.name: Booker T: Part 1
episodes.overview: JBL sits down with WWE Hall of Famer Booker T to discuss early troubles, the relationship with his brother Stevie Ray and making it to WCW.

episodes.name: Booker T: Part 2
episodes.overview: JBL's interview continues with Booker T revealing the highs, lows and backstage controversies experienced during the Hall of Famer's career.

episodes.name: Sting
episodes.overview: JBL interviews the Icon Sting in a rare interview that covers the Hall of Famer's WCW career as well as his shocking retirement from WWE.

episodes.name: Scott Hall & Kevin Nash
episodes.overview: JBL sits down with WWE Hall of Famers Scott Hall and Kevin Nash to talk about everything from the rise and fall of WCW to their undeniable impact on sports entertainment.

episodes.name: Bruno Sammartino
episodes.overview: JBL sits down with ‘The Living Legend’ Bruno Sammartino to discuss memorable exploits from his extraordinary life and career, including fleeing the Nazis in World War II, his historic 4,040 day reign as WWE Champion, and his controversial departure from the world of sports entertainment.

episodes.name: Alundra Blayze
episodes.overview: JBL sits down with the WWE Hall of Famer Alundra Blayze to discuss her infamous title trashing, a shocking near-death experience and how her humble beginnings helped her reach the pinnacle of two male-dominated industries.

episodes.name: Stan Hansen
episodes.overview: JBL sits down with the legendary Stan Hansen to discuss everything from breaking Bruno Sammartino’s neck and his rivalry with Andre the Giant, to his 2016 induction into the WWE Hall of Fame!

episodes.name: Jimmy Hart
episodes.overview: JBL sits down with WWE Hall of Famer Jimmy Hart to discuss his contributions within the music industry, his favorite WWE Superstars, his thoughts on Hulk Hogan's controversial comments, and some of the most outrageous moments in Memphis Wrestling, including working with legendary comedian Andy Kaufman.
